ygData.subject: Re: Welcome to EQ_women@onelist.com
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I think it s worth the cost, but I m still waiting for something better, there isn t so far...  The best part of the game is playing and chatting with the
ygData.messageBody:
> I am about to buy this game and I wanted to get some
> opinion from some of you
> who are in it about it and how good it is and
> whether it is worth the cost.

I think it's worth the cost, but I'm still waiting for
something better, there isn't so far... The best part
of the game is playing and chatting with the other
people and learning to be a team. The leveling begins
to be a bore after getting your 2nd or third character
to level 20 I think, not that I'll stop playing
because of that! :)
